subject: Shifter order update
description_text:
Hi my wife ordered one of your shifters ordered 8th December  order number #ssn4561.

We were hoping for a update on when this will be shipped

Regards
Neil bailey

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi neil bailey,    We apologize for the delay. Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive on the 6th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209621692
